title: How to Paint Your Boring, White Plastic Outlet Covers
description:
Picture an electrical outlet cover or a light switch plate: What color is it? If you’re thinking of one that’s plastic and either white or off-white (either by design, or because of layers of grime), you’re not alone.

Read more...

title: Hypoallergenic Dogs Don't Exist, But These Breeds Are the Most Allergy-Friendly
description: For the approximately 15 to 30 percent of Americans allergic to cats or dogs, getting a furry friend can be tricky. And while you’re twice as likely to be allergic to cats than dogs, generally speaking,
